Ã‚Â³                           Cracking Notes/Comments                          Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                          ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~                         Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  Well, what can I say. This has got to be one of the hardest titles I      Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  have ever ripped. The crack was trivial, but ripping this game involved   Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  understanding and coding utilities for Blizzard&#039;s MoPaQ file packer. MPQ  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  (as it is better known as) is a complex file packaging/indexing system    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  that combines one-way hash tables for file lookup, encryption on files    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  and indexes, custom tuned compression code...a veritable nightmare.       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  The game originally came shipped with a 600M INSTALL.EXE file (really     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  an installer stub + giant MPQ file), and this was the file that had to    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  be ripped apart. Needless to say, I think I have done it...it was a LOT   Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  of work, and I tested this as much as humanly possible, so I hope you     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  all enjoy it. If you have any problems with this crack, please let me     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  know via IRC in #razor...I&#039;m never claim to be perfect. =)                Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  As for BATTLE.NET support, I have decided after much analysis and talk    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  with other respected crackers, that it cannot be done without some MAJOR  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  coding. All Starcraft CD&#039;s came bundled with a unique CD-Key that is      Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  embedded in the STARDAT.MPQ file on install. Each user on BATTLE.NET      Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  must meet two important requirements: (a) they have a unique CD-Key and   Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  (b) their executables (and DLLs) are untouched. It is theoretically       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  possible to create a generator for these CD-Keys after collecting a       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  bunch of codes, but that is only half the battle...you then have to       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  generate a random valid code, and insert it into the STARDAT.MPQ. Much    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  easier said than done. I did code the crack for this game in a loader     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  format to allow for a future generator to be "plugged in".                Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  Once again, I *MAY* code a generator for this depending on how feasible   Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  I think it is, but it will take time. Do not harrass me...I will do what  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  I can. Just use KALI or a similar IPX emulator to play via Internet for   Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  now, and if you REALLY have to play battle.net, buy the game.             Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                        - Beowulf [RAZOR 1911]              Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
